<a id="AnimationNode"></a>

# AnimationNode

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AnimationNodeExtension](AnimationNodeExtension.md), [AnimationNodeOutput](AnimationNodeOutput.md), [AnimationNodeSync](AnimationNodeSync.md), [AnimationNodeTimeScale](AnimationNodeTimeScale.md), [AnimationNodeTimeSeek](AnimationNodeTimeSeek.md), [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md)

Base class for [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md) nodes. Not related to scene nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base resource for [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md) nodes. In general, it's not used directly, but you can create custom ones with custom blending formulas.

Inherit this when creating animation nodes mainly for use in [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md), otherwise [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) should be used instead.

You can access the time information as read-only parameter which is processed and stored in the previous frame for all nodes except [AnimationNodeOutput](AnimationNodeOutput.md).

\ **Note:** If multiple inputs exist in the **AnimationNode**, which time information takes precedence depends on the type of **AnimationNode**.

```
    var current_length = $AnimationTree["parameters/AnimationNodeName/current_length"]
    var current_position = $AnimationTree["parameters/AnimationNodeName/current_position"]
    var current_delta = $AnimationTree["parameters/AnimationNodeName/current_delta"]
```


<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using AnimationTree](../tutorials/animation/animation_tree.md)

## Signals

<a id="AnimationNode_signal_animation_node_removed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_node_removed**\ (\ object_id\: [int](int.md), name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_signal_animation_node_removed)

Emitted by nodes that inherit from this class and that have an internal tree when one of their animation nodes removes. The animation nodes that emit this signal are [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D.md), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md), [AnimationNodeStateMachine](AnimationNodeStateMachine.md), and [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_signal_animation_node_renamed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_node_renamed**\ (\ object_id\: [int](int.md), old_name\: [String](String.md), new_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_signal_animation_node_renamed)

Emitted by nodes that inherit from this class and that have an internal tree when one of their animation node names changes. The animation nodes that emit this signal are [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D.md), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md), [AnimationNodeStateMachine](AnimationNodeStateMachine.md), and [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_signal_tree_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**tree_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_signal_tree_changed)

Emitted by nodes that inherit from this class and that have an internal tree when one of their animation nodes changes. The animation nodes that emit this signal are [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D.md), [AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md), [AnimationNodeStateMachine](AnimationNodeStateMachine.md), [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md) and [AnimationNodeTransition](AnimationNodeTransition.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **FilterAction**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction)

<a id="AnimationNode_constant_FILTER_IGNORE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) **FILTER_IGNORE** = `0`

Do not use filtering.<a id="AnimationNode_constant_FILTER_PASS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) **FILTER_PASS** = `1`

Paths matching the filter will be allowed to pass.<a id="AnimationNode_constant_FILTER_STOP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) **FILTER_STOP** = `2`

Paths matching the filter will be discarded.<a id="AnimationNode_constant_FILTER_BLEND"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) **FILTER_BLEND** = `3`

Paths matching the filter will be blended (by the blend value).<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

If ``true``, filtering is enabled.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__get_caption"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **_get_caption**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__get_caption)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to override the text caption for this animation node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__get_child_by_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **_get_child_by_name**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__get_child_by_name)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return a child animation node by its `name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__get_child_nodes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **_get_child_nodes**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__get_child_nodes)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return all child animation nodes in order as a ``name: node`` dictionary.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__get_parameter_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **_get_parameter_default_value**\ (\ parameter\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__get_parameter_default_value)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return the default value of a `parameter`. Parameters are custom local memory used for your animation nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__get_parameter_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md) **_get_parameter_list**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__get_parameter_list)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return a list of the properties on this animation node. Parameters are custom local memory used for your animation nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees. Format is similar to [Object.get_property_list()](Object.md#Object_method_get_property_list).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__has_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_has_filter**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__has_filter)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return whether the blend tree editor should display filter editing on this animation node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__is_parameter_read_only"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_parameter_read_only**\ (\ parameter\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__is_parameter_read_only)

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to return whether the `parameter` is read-only. Parameters are custom local memory used for your animation nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_private_method__process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **_process**\ (\ time\: [float](float.md), seek\: [bool](bool.md), is_external_seeking\: [bool](bool.md), test_only\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_private_method__process)

**Deprecated:** Currently this is mostly useless as there is a lack of many APIs to extend AnimationNode by GDScript. It is planned that a more flexible API using structures will be provided in the future.

When inheriting from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), implement this virtual method to run some code when this animation node is processed. The `time` parameter is a relative delta, unless `seek` is ``true``, in which case it is absolute.

Here, call the [blend_input()](AnimationNode.md#AnimationNode_method_blend_input), [blend_node()](AnimationNode.md#AnimationNode_method_blend_node) or [blend_animation()](AnimationNode.md#AnimationNode_method_blend_animation) functions. You can also use [get_parameter()](AnimationNode.md#AnimationNode_method_get_parameter) and [set_parameter()](AnimationNode.md#AnimationNode_method_set_parameter) to modify local memory.

This function should return the delta.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_add_input"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **add_input**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_add_input)

Adds an input to the animation node. This is only useful for animation nodes created for use in an [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md). If the addition fails, returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_blend_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **blend_animation**\ (\ animation\: [StringName](StringName.md), time\: [float](float.md), delta\: [float](float.md), seeked\: [bool](bool.md), is_external_seeking\: [bool](bool.md), blend\: [float](float.md), looped_flag\: [LoopedFlag](Animation.md#enum_Animation_LoopedFlag) = 0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_blend_animation)

Blends an animation by `blend` amount (name must be valid in the linked [AnimationPlayer](AnimationPlayer.md)). A `time` and `delta` may be passed, as well as whether `seeked` happened.

A `looped_flag` is used by internal processing immediately after the loop.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_blend_input"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **blend_input**\ (\ input_index\: [int](int.md), time\: [float](float.md), seek\: [bool](bool.md), is_external_seeking\: [bool](bool.md), blend\: [float](float.md), filter\: [FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) = 0, sync\: [bool](bool.md) = true, test_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_blend_input)

Blends an input. This is only useful for animation nodes created for an [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md). The `time` parameter is a relative delta, unless `seek` is ``true``, in which case it is absolute. A filter mode may be optionally passed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_blend_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **blend_node**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), node\: [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md), time\: [float](float.md), seek\: [bool](bool.md), is_external_seeking\: [bool](bool.md), blend\: [float](float.md), filter\: [FilterAction](AnimationNode.md#enum_AnimationNode_FilterAction) = 0, sync\: [bool](bool.md) = true, test_only\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_blend_node)

Blend another animation node (in case this animation node contains child animation nodes). This function is only useful if you inherit from [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) instead, otherwise editors will not display your animation node for addition.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_find_input"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **find_input**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_find_input)

Returns the input index which corresponds to `name`. If not found, returns ``-1``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_get_input_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_input_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_get_input_count)

Amount of inputs in this animation node, only useful for animation nodes that go into [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_get_input_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_input_name**\ (\ input\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_get_input_name)

Gets the name of an input by index.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_get_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **get_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_get_parameter)

Gets the value of a parameter. Parameters are custom local memory used for your animation nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_get_processing_animation_tree_instance_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_processing_animation_tree_instance_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_get_processing_animation_tree_instance_id)

Returns the object id of the [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md) that owns this node.

\ **Note:** This method should only be called from within the [AnimationNodeExtension._process_animation_node()](AnimationNodeExtension.md#AnimationNodeExtension_private_method__process_animation_node) method, and will return an invalid id otherwise.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_is_path_filtered"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_path_filtered**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_is_path_filtered)

Returns ``true`` if the given path is filtered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_is_process_testing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_process_testing**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_is_process_testing)

Returns ``true`` if this animation node is being processed in test-only mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_remove_input"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_input**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_remove_input)

Removes an input, call this only when inactive.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_set_filter_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_filter_path**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), enable\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_set_filter_path)

Adds or removes a path for the filter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_set_input_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **set_input_name**\ (\ input\: [int](int.md), name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_set_input_name)

Sets the name of the input at the given `input` index. If the setting fails, returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNode_method_set_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), value\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNode_method_set_parameter)

Sets a custom parameter. These are used as local memory, because resources can be reused across the tree or scenes.
